content.rendered:
Fabrication

Street Light Bulbs Tubular & Conical

Solar street lights are composed of a simple structure of LED, Battery unit, Pole and a Solar Panel. It is designed to withstand the dark hours of night with an automated sensing switch. 
 
Residential Containers
Residential Containers are the best solution for temporary living at construction sites and far-away regions. Coping   with   weather circumstances and maintaining a decent lifestyle are the key benefits of this product.
 
Battery Boxes & Racks
Battery boxes and racks provide a great solution for safe keeping of the batteries, hence sustain life time and   performance
 

Project Images

Manual Tracker System

Ferrotek Solar Tracking System is an optimized solution for better extraction and generation of energy by setting up the system for the best incident angle. The system enables you to get advantage of an efficient system of your own with acceptable cost

Specifications
FERROTEK™ Manual Tracking System with flange for 2.5kW PV, (Powder coated or Hot Dip Galvanized), movable in 2-D with GI Nuts & Bolts.
 
Flash Test Report
 

Project Images

ATS Tracking System

Ferrotek Auto tracking System is sophisticatedly designed system works on its own. It can optimize its angle by itself producing better performance of energy generation rate the best incident angle.

Specifications
 FERROTEK™ Auto Tracking System with flange & PLC for 2.5kW PV, (Powder coated or Hot Dip Galvanized), movable in   2-D.
 
Flash Test Report
 

Project Images

Solar Rooftop Fixed Frame

Ferrotek élites its designs and products according to the requisites. Rooftop fixed frames are well equipped designs for high wind speeds, residential, Industrial and commercial solutions. An array of PVs ranging from 1-6 or more are composed to meet the premises loads.

Specifications
Fixed PV Structure GI Sheet, 14SWG for PV Panels Mounting, complete with nuts & bolts.
 
Flash Test Report
 

Project Images

Solar Rooftop Shed Type Frame

Ferrotek élites its designs and products according to the requisites. Rooftop Shed Type Frames are well equipped designs for high wind speeds, residential, Industrial and commercial solutions. An array of PVs ranging from 1-6 or more are composed to meet the premises loads, the design also adds plus benefit of providing a shelter. 

Specifications
Fixed PV Structure, Standard Components with poles, nuts & bolts.
 
Flash Test Report
 

Project Images
